text: Ma olen Tartu ja sina oled Tallinn
Anyone knows in which room is the lab today?
Hi guys! do you know when is going to start snowing?
I love this city especially its people and vibrant culture!

This is a famous poem from my home country:
Tu subes como la marea,
yo bajo como la tension.
Pa mi es como un rompecabezas
lo que pa ti cae de cajón.
Yo tengo arrugas en el alma,
tu piedras en el corazón.
Mis sentimientos van en chanclas,
y los tuyos visten de dior.
Good luck on this new semester everyone!
Thank you! Good luck to you too!
We had fun yesterday at the Delta Center, didn't we?
I've lost my keys at the Physicum, has anyone seen them?
Don't worry, I found them, in my pocket.
